#summary Getting started

= Getting Started =

== Checkout Source ==

   * Checkout source for this project. See http://code.google.com/p/pdf-pub-tools/source/checkout

eg.
{{{
% md -p $HOME/work/project/pdf-pub-tools/trunk
% cd $HOME/work/project/pdf-pub-tools/trunk
% svn  checkout  https://pdf-pub-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/pdf-pub-tools
}}}


== Build Tools ==

=== Bourne Shell CLI ===

eg.

{{{
% cd $HOME/work/project/pdf-pub-tools/trunk
% ant clean deploy
}}}

The runtime items (eg. scripts, libraries) are built and deployed to the "deploy" folder.

=== Eclipse IDE ===

   * Import pdf-pub-tools project into Eclipse IDE as an existing Java project.
   * Build project.
